paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation.
address: 21045 Erwin St, Woodland Hills, CA 91367, United States
companyName: Law Office of Seydi A. Morales
valueProp:
The Law Office of Seydi A. Morales delivers top-tier legal assistance in Los Angeles, specializing in employment, workers compensation, and personal injury cases. With a commitment to transparency and client comfort, the team ensures no hidden fees and optimal outcomes for each case.

Seydi A. Morales founded the boutique law firm in 2019 with a small team of experienced legal professionals. Specializing in employment, workers' compensation, and personal injury law, the firm prioritizes client relationships and cost-efficient solutions. With over 70 years of collective experience, the team at the Law Office of Seydi A. Morales is dedicated to providing high-quality legal services.
